How can I add a user?

To add a user to your ad account, follow these steps:
1. Go to Account Management.
2. Click ‘Access’ under your preferred Organization or Ad account.
3. Select the option to add a new user and enter their email address.
4. Assign the appropriate role and permissions for the new user.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to our Account Management Guide here: [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).
